snippet.title: FireMan: Incoming Storm [Part 1]
snippet.description:
Hello all, you might remember my last video where I fought all 3 X-Hunters at once. That was from IRA's flash game, "Fall of 21XX". Now, IRA is not only good at flash games, he is also an excellent artist who has only gotten better throughout the years. Among his earilest work is a 4 part comic series depicting his tale of FireMan, one of the first robot masters.

The story is basically about how FireMan was rebuilt after losing to Megaman and then ran off to be by himself, ala Protoman. He took some time to figure out who was the one to blame for his fall into darkness. He decided it was his both his own fault and Dr. Wily's, so he spends the comic series trying to come to terms with himself and to try to atone for his mistakes by hunting the man partly responsible for his dark ways. The comic series ended with FireMan killing off Wily's "Super Search Man", and goes off to look for Wily himself, having come to terms with the Light family. The flash game takes place after the comic series. Now, all of his comics are up for free, and all in english at his site: 
http://www.iragination.com/

I suggest you give his site a look, for his games and for his art and comics.
Now then, enjoy...
